page.title: 20MAIN MEAL FOR FOUR. CREDITS.
page.content: A typical main meal for four people is beef casserole.Boiled potatoes and dumplings are usually served but the other vegetables would vary;namely carrots,peas,swede,runner/broad-beans cabbage,cauliflower or spinach.Follow- ed by rice-pudding Cost:beef Â£2.flour{ stock-cube,suet 30p.carrots 25p.onions 10p.potatoes 50p.rice,milk & sugar 50p Total cost,including tea/coffee,approx Â£4.00. {CREDITS } Children and staff of Werrington C.P. School. Mr.& Mrs. D. Baker. Miss J. Rendell. Anne O'Sullivan. Christine Chopak. Mr.R.P.Truscott. Mr.G.Walters. The Reeves Family. Mrs.M.Jones. Mrs. J. Dauncey.
